message: I'm excited to offer you this unique opportunity to purchase this valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to start the negotiation at a price of $1100000. This is a competitive offer, and I'm confident you'll find it reasonable given the product's value to you.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value to me.

I understand you have a strong interest in the product, but $950000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $1025000. This is a fair price considering the product's value to you, and I believe it's a reasonable compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $990000, but that's as high as I can go. I hope we can find a mutually agreeable price.

I understand you're close to your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $990000. I'm willing to make one more compromise, so I'm counteroffering at $1020000. This is as low as I'm willing to go, and I believe it's still a fair price considering the product's value to you.
